sourcesContent:
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Username</mat-label>
    <input matInput [(ngModel)]="field.username.model">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Job #</mat-label>
    <input matInput Drawing="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field appearance="fill">
    <mat-label>Manufaturer</mat-label>
    <input matInput Manufacturer="">
</mat-form-field>
<mat-form-field>
    <mat-label>Aircraft</mat-label>
    <input matInput Aircraft>
</mat-form-field>
<button mat-button (click)="saveData()">Save Details</button>
